public interface SharedJoiner2Settings<TSelf extends SharedJoiner2Settings<TSelf,TQuotingMapJoinerSettings>,TQuotingMapJoinerSettings extends MapJoiner2Settings<TQuotingMapJoinerSettings>>

Method Detail

withSeparator

TSelf withSeparator(String separator)
Constructs a new instance with new element separator.

Parameters:
separator - String to insert between elements during join. Must not be null, but can be "" (empty string). Example: ", " (comma + space)
Returns:
new instance with new element separator
Throws:
NullPointerException - if separator is null
See Also:
withSeparator(char), withSeparator()

withFormatter

TSelf withFormatter(Formatter2 formatter)
Constructs a new instance with new value formatter. Formatters can be used to add a prefix or suffix to each value.

Parameters:
formatter - value formatter to add a prefix and/or suffix to each value. Must not be null.
Returns:
new instance with formatter for each element
Throws:
NullPointerException - if formatter is null
See Also:
withFormatter(), Joiner2Utils.DEFAULT_FORMATTER

withFormatter

Formatter2 withFormatter()
Retrieves the current value formatter. The default is no prefix or suffix.

Returns:
current value formatter
See Also:
withFormatter(Formatter2), Joiner2Utils.DEFAULT_FORMATTER

useForNoElements

TSelf useForNoElements(String noElementsText)
Constructs a new instance with new text to use when join finds no elements.

Parameters:
noElementsText - String to be used when join finds no elements. Must not be null, but can be "" (empty string). Example: "(empty)"
Returns:
new instance with new no elements text
Throws:
NullPointerException - if noElementsText is null
See Also:
useForNoElements(char), useForNoElements(), Joiner2Utils.DEFAULT_NO_ELEMENTS_TEXT

useForNoElements

Retrieves text to use when join finds no elements. Default is "" (empty string).

no elements text

withKeyValueSeparator

TQuotingMapJoinerSettings withKeyValueSeparator(String keyValueSeparator)
Constructs a new instance of MapJoiner2 to join map entries.

Parameters:
keyValueSeparator - String to insert between keys and values during join. Must not be null, but can be "" (empty string). Example: "=" (equals)
Returns:
new instance of MapJoiner2Impl
Throws:
NullPointerException - if keyValueSeparator is null
See Also:
withKeyValueSeparator(char)
